summary: Waits a given number of milliseconds before the activation of the <doc-ocp-name translate=no>Out</doc-ocp-name> output control port.
description:
The behavior of this block guarantees you the Out output port will not be activated before the provided Delay has been reached.
However, Javascript being asynchronous, nothing guarantees the Out output control port will be activated at the exact provided Delay!

dataPorts.Delay: the duration of the wait process (in milliseconds).

controlPorts.Out: is activated when the process is completed (the <doc-idp-name translate=no>Delay</doc-idp-name> value has been reached).
